  * I am an admin of http://gillesbertaux.com
  * I am gilles (https://keybase.io/gilles) on keybase.
  * I have a public key with fingerprint E099 35CF FD1A DC21 874A  EF2E 53AC E3AE 01D7 5032

To claim this, I am signing this object:

{
    "body": {
        "key": {
            "fingerprint": "e09935cffd1adc21874aef2e53ace3ae01d75032",

            "hostname": "gillesbertaux.com",

    "expire_in": 157680000,

    "tag": "signature"
}
